- packages.bib

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)

options(digits = 2)

library(GerminaR)
library(knitr)
library(cowplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(png)
library(jpeg)
library(DT)
library(citr)

```
